p: Concerning bee products supplied by beekeepers ( Figure 4) and ( Table 2), 10.77% of beekeepers produced and marketed only honey, while 89.23% produced and marketed honey and other bee products by the following percentages: 83.30% bee wax, 63.60% fresh bee pollen, 43.90% propolis, 22.70% dry bee pollen, 15.20% bee queens production, 7.60% royal jelly, 4.50% bee venom, 3% fresh bee bread, and 0% dry bee bread.
